verses.text: These \add be\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, in the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* the \w Red|strong="H5489"\w* \add sea\add*, between \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*, and \w Tophel|strong="H8603"\w*, and \w Laban|strong="H3837"\w*, and \w Hazeroth|strong="H2698"\w*, and \w Dizahab|strong="H1774"\w*.\f + \fr 1.1 \ft the Red…: or, Zuph\f*

(\add There are\add* \w eleven|strong="H0259"\w* \w days’|strong="H3117"\w* \add journey\add* from \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* unto \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w*.)

And it came to pass in the \w fortieth|strong="H0705"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, on the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, according unto all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had given him in \w commandment|strong="H6680"\w* unto them;

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* he had \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Astaroth|strong="H6252"\w* in \w Edrei|strong="H0154"\w*:

On this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w began|strong="H2974"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* to \w declare|strong="H0874"\w* this \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto us in \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye have \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* long \w enough|strong="H7227"\w* in this \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*:

\w Turn|strong="H6437"\w* you, and take your \w journey|strong="H5265"\w*, and \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and unto all \add the places\add* \w nigh|strong="H7934"\w* thereunto, in the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*, in the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, and in the \w vale|strong="H8219"\w*, and in the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H2348"\w*, to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and unto \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, unto the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft all…: Heb. all his neighbours\f*

\w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you: \w go|strong="H0935"\w* in and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto them and to their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft set: Heb. given\f*

¶ And I \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto you at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I am not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* you myself \w alone|strong="H0905"\w*:

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* you, and, behold, ye \add are\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* as the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*.

(The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* make you a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* so many more \w as|strong="H3254"\w* ye \add are\add*, and \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* you, as he hath \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* you!)
\w How|strong="H0349"\w* can I myself alone \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* your \w cumbrance|strong="H2960"\w*, and your \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*, and your \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*?

\w Take|strong="H3051"\w* you \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*, and \w known|strong="H3045"\w* among your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, and I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* them \w rulers|strong="H7218"\w* over you.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft Take: Heb. Give\f*

And ye \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* me, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add for us\add* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

So I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, and \w made|strong="H5414"\w* them \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* over you, \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w fifties|strong="H2572"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w tens|strong="H6235"\w*, and \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* among your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*.\f + \fr 1.15 \ft made: Heb. gave\f*

And I \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* your \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add the causes\add* between your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w righteously|strong="H6664"\w* between \add every\add* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \add that is\add* with him.

Ye shall not \w respect|strong="H5234"\w* \w persons|strong="H6440"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; \add but\add* ye shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w small|strong="H6996"\w* as well as the \w great|strong="H1419"\w*; ye shall not be \w afraid|strong="H1481"\w* of the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; for the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add is\add* \w God’s|strong="H0430"\w*: and the \w cause|strong="H1697"\w* that is too \w hard|strong="H7185"\w* for you, \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \add it\add* unto me, and I will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* it.\f + \fr 1.17 \ft respect…: Heb. acknowledge faces\f*
And I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* all the \w things|strong="H1697"\w* which ye should \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ And when we \w departed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*, we went \w through|strong="H3212"\w* all that \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, which ye \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* us; and we \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w*.

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, Ye are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* doth \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto us.

\w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \add and\add* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \add it\add*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee; \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, neither be \w discouraged|strong="H2865"\w*.

¶ And ye came \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto me every one of you, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us, and they shall search us \w out|strong="H2658"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* us \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* by what \w way|strong="H1870"\w* we must go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and into what \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* we shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

And the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* pleased me \w well|strong="H3190"\w*: and I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of you, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of a \w tribe|strong="H0376"\w*:

And they \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Eshcol|strong="H0812"\w*, and searched it \w out|strong="H7270"\w*.

And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and brought \add it\add* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto us, and \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* us \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* doth \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us.

Notwithstanding ye \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, but \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

And ye \w murmured|strong="H7279"\w* in your \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hated|strong="H8135"\w* us, he hath brought us \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* us into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* us.

Whither shall we go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*? our \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* have \w discouraged|strong="H4549"\w* our \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add is\add* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* and \w taller|strong="H7311"\w* than we; the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add are\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and walled \w up|strong="H1219"\w* to \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; and moreover we have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w* there.\f + \fr 1.28 \ft discouraged: Heb. melted\f*
Then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, \w Dread|strong="H6206"\w* not, neither be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of them.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* which \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, he shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* for you, according to all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* for you in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* before your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*;

And in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, where thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* how that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* thee, as a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* doth \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, in all the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that ye \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, until ye \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.
Yet in this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* ye did not \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*,

Who \w went|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, to search you \w out|strong="H8446"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to pitch your \w tents|strong="H2583"\w* \add in\add*, in \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, to \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* you by what \w way|strong="H1870"\w* ye should \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, and in a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of your \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and was \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w*, and \w sware|strong="H7650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Surely there shall not \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*,

\w Save|strong="H2108"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*; he shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* it, and to him will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* he hath trodden \w upon|strong="H1869"\w*, and to his \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, because he hath \w wholly|strong="H4390"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 1.36 \ft wholly…: Heb. fulfilled to go after\f*

Also the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with me for your \w sakes|strong="H1558"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou also shalt not \w go|strong="H0935"\w* in \w thither|strong="H8033"\w*.

\add But\add* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, which \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, he shall go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thither: \w encourage|strong="H2388"\w* him: for he shall cause \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* it.

Moreover your little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, which ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w* should be a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*, and your \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, which in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* had no \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* between \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, they shall go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thither, and unto them will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it, and they shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

But \add as for\add* you, \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* you, and take your \w journey|strong="H5265"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

Then ye \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, we will go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*, according to all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* us. And when ye had \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* on every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, ye were \w ready|strong="H1951"\w* to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Go not \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, neither \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*; for I \add am\add* not \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you; lest ye be \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

So I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto you; and ye would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, but \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w presumptuously|strong="H2102"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 1.43 \ft went…: Heb. ye were presumptuous, and went up\f*

And the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in that \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* you, and \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* you, as \w bees|strong="H1682"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w destroyed|strong="H3807"\w* you in \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*.

And ye \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; but the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* would not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to your \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, nor give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* unto you.

So ye \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, according unto the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that ye \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* \add there\add*.
